summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to an amending Plat 234W, page 30 of the Official Zoning Map of The City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300, to rezone certain property located in Block 89, Maple Leaf Addition to green Lake Circle from Single family Residence High Density (RS 5000) Zone to Community Business (BC) Zone and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith (Petition of John C. Vertrees, C.F. 288229).
